messages.content: I'm happy I live in a country where machete attacks don't have to be a real concern.
It will be carefully tailored to piss their parents off, which I will enjoy greatly :-)
That's that frequency dying in your ears. Enjoy it, because you will never hear that exact frequency again
Feels good getting a number next to our name again.
Glad I tend to post pics of my cats and not myself.
Glad I took the 1st half spread
i never thought i would read the phrase 600 lb cinematic universe but i am glad i did
My friend and I have been having good fun queuing Mei/Winston, trololo, and 2 bottles of whisky.
Those guys are TOUGH. glad to see Blackwater back in business to keep the peace over there

I stand corrected. As I said, wonderful charities. I will always enjoy GDQ, just not revalant to my experience.
I crave physical contact. I get irritable if I go too long without it, which conflicts with the fact that I also enjoy being alone.
Going to my favorite greasy burger place in Madison tonight to celebrate my ability to eat delicious burgers whenever I want because I'm in my early 20's
